example.eg: Several of the candidates took part in the debate.
example.egtrans: 有几位候选人参加了辩论。

example.eg: We've narrowed the list of candidates to four.
example.egtrans: 我们已把候选人名单缩减到四人。

dsense.name: candidate
dsense.guideword: (person who is suitable for [sth]) (被认为可能适合者)

example.eg: Do you think he's a suitable candidate for promotion?
example.egtrans: 你觉得他是晋升的合适人选吗？

dsense.name: eligible candidate
dsense.guideword: ([sb] who may be voted for) (竞选等)

dsense.name: eligible candidate
dsense.guideword: figurative ([sb] qualified for a job) (比喻，职位等)

example.eg: We're obliged by law to consider all eligible candidates.
The parliamentary candidate gave a speech.
